DOC.brief_summary: To assess the effects of a 16-week individualized, intensive strength training program in patients with rheumatoid arthritis. Primary and secondary outcomes include: strength and body composition, function, disease activity, pain, quality of life. We hypothesized that improvements would be seen in all of the above outcomes.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of a 16-Week Individualized, Intensive Strength Training Program in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis
